article_title: There’s a new pajama boy in town, and he’s udderly awesome [photo] – twitchy.com
article_text:
Obama’s emasculated pajama boy thrilled all of us conservatives looking to mock liberals for putting the beta in beta males, but conservative John Leschen takes the cake with his bovine parody.

@johnleschen Hahaha. I'm surprised they haven't duct taped you to the wall. — Wit'sEnd (@Nayrue) December 25, 2013

@johnleschen Hmm. Cow costume (Anti-PETA); Which is predominantly white (Racist); Cowboy boots? (PETA again!) Not Starbucks coffee! 😉 — David (@cupsdaddy) December 25, 2013

https://twitter.com/danielsan0527/status/415718588759044097

@johnleschen That's because the cow pajamas are not PETA approved. You likely offended someone with those… — Mr. L (@awleland) December 25, 2013

Related:

Rut-roh! New individual mandate delay spells trouble for Pajama Boy [Photoshop]

‘Priceless!’ You won’t believe who has become OFA’s latest #PajamaBoy [Photoshop]

MSNBC ‘reporter’: Criticism of OFA #PajamaBoy is cyberbullying; Mockery dons a onesie

Move over, Pajama Boy! New ‘ad’ reveals Obama’s latest sidesplitting Obamacare-begging [Photoshop]

More to mock! Is there something worse than #PajamaBoy’s onesie? Behold the horror [pic]
